metadataAttributes.Title: Business Analytics Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Make Data-Driven Business Decisions. Achieve fluency in business data strategies in four discipline-specific courses.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Customer Analytics, Analytics, Business Analytics, Decision Tree, Predictive Analytics, Regression Analysis, Marketing Performance Measurement And Management, Simulation, Mathematical Optimization, Solver, Talent Management, Performance Management,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Eric Bradlow ,Peter Fader ,Raghu Iyengar ,Ron Berman ,Senthil Veeraraghavan ,Sergei Savin ,Noah Gans ,Cade Massey ,Martine Haas ,Matthew Bidwell ,Brian J Bushee ,Christopher D. Ittner ,Wharton Teaching Staff ,
